title: Footed Bowl and Plate
medium: Glass, opalescent white; blown, bowl with applied stem and blown applied foot, fired silver and gold decoration
dimensions:
Bowl - H. 4 3/4 in. (12.1 cm)
             W. 8 in. (20.3 cm)
Dish -  Diam. 10 in. (25.4 cm)
creditLine: Metropolitan Museum of Art. Purchase, Cynthia Hazen Polsky and Leon B. Polsky Fund and The Annenberg Foundation Gift, 2000
